¡Mario y Luigi parten y se van al hoyo-en-uno! Los circuitos en el juego se basan en circuitos de la vida real en los Estados Unidos.

Cette version du jeu offrait aux joueurs la possibilité d'envoyer via un service de FAX son score. Un concours se déroula donc et les 100 premiers vainqueurs reçurent chez eux une plaque avec leur nom inscrit, ainsi qu'une version spéciale du jeu dans une disquette dorée nommée Golf: Special Course. 9900 autres disquettes dorées furent offertes sans la plaque mais les circonstances de leur don sont méconnues.Le jeu est à peu près le même que Golf: US Course, mais en plus difficile.

locale.title: The Goonies
locale.synopsis: The Goonies was developed by Konami in 1986. Naturally, it is based somewhat on the movie of the same name, where a boy named Mikey and his friends discover the treasure of a pirate just in time to prevent their home town from being bought out by greedy land developers. While the game incoporates some of the more identifiable aspects of the movie, it follows a decidedly different plot line, with the gang of Mikey's friend captured by the Frateli family, one of the movie's antagonists. Mikey is therefore required to proceed from stage to stage and rescue them, while exploring labyrinthine dungeons and locating power-up items. There are six stages in all. Power-ups and diamonds are hidden from sight. To reveal them, players must discover the particular joystick input specific to the stage they are hidden in. After the player completes the stages at the first level of difficulty, the input required for each stage changes in the second level. Many secrets are scattered throughout the game including cameos from the likes of Konamiman, and Twinbee. Even a secret warp can be found in order to bypass one level. Many of the features and items introduced in this version found their way into the more advanced sequel.
Un juego de acción y aventuras de Konami basado en la película de 1985. Mikey debe salvar a los otros Goonies de los Fratellis, fantasmas piratas y un enorme pulpo buscando las claves para progresar.

Les Goonies repose un peu sur le film du même nom, où un garçon nommé Mikey et ses amis découvrent le Trésor d'un pirate juste à temps pour empêcher leur ville natale d'être racheté par des promoteurs avides. Alors que le jeu reprend certains des aspects du film, il s'ensuit une intrigue décidément différente, avec le gang de Mikey capturé par la famille Frateli. Mikey doit les secourir en explorant des donjons. Il y a six niveaux en tout. Power-ups et diamants sont cachés.Après que le joueur ais terminé les étapes du premier niveau de difficulté, il accède au deuxième niveau. Beaucoup de secrets sont disséminés dans le jeu.

locale.title: Green Beret
locale.synopsis: Based on the arcade game of the same name, the player's objective in the FDS version was changed from rescuing prisoners to destroying a secret weapon being developed in the enemy's headquarters. Additionally, a 2-players co-operative mode was introduced as well, allowing two players to play simultaneously (with Player 1 in blue and Player 2 in red). The play mechanics are essentially identical to the arcade version, however the Flamethrower is removed (only the Rocket Launcher and Grenades remained) and two new power-up items are introduced: a Star mark which grants invincibility and a pistol with unlimited ammo, both which are only usable for a limited period. The FDS version also features two additional stages that were not in the arcade game: an airport set between the Missile Base and the Harbor, where the player faces a group of rocket soldiers at the end; and a new final stage set inside the enemy's base in which the player must disarm a nuclear missile at the end that is about to be launched; by using rocket launchers dropped by enemy soldiers. The flamethrower corps at the end of the Warehouse stage was replaced by a paratrooper unit.

Allá afuera, en un territorio hostil, tus amigos yacen cautivos en un campamento enemigo. Solo tú puedes sacarlos. Your GREEN BERET te señala como un operador de gran habilidad, fuerza y ??coraje. ¿Será eso suficiente?

Basé sur le jeu d'arcade du même nom.L' objectif du joueur dans cette version a été changé. Il doit détruire une arme secrète en cours d'élaboration au siège de l'ennemi. En outre, un mode coopératif 2-joueurs a été introduit, permettant aux deux joueurs de jouer simultanément (avec le joueur 1 en bleu et le joueur 2 en rouge). La mécanique de jeu est identique à la version arcade, cependant le lance-flammes est supprimé (seulement le lance-roquettes et des Grenades) et deux améliorations : une étoile qui accorde l'invincibilité et un pistolet avec des munitions illimitées, qui ne sont utilisables que pour une période limitée. La version FDS comporte également deux niveaux supplémentaires qui n'étaient pas dans le jeu d'arcade : un aéroport situé entre la Base de missiles et le port, où le joueur fait face à un groupe de soldats et une nouvelle phase finale à l'intérieur de la base ennemie dans lequel le joueur doit désarmer un missile nucléaire qui est sur le point d'être lancés.

locale.title: Gun.Smoke
locale.synopsis:
The objective is to free the town of Hicksville from the band of criminals known as the Wingates. But in order to capture their most dangerous henchmen, in each stage the player must retrieve a Wanted sign of said henchman, otherwise it is impossible to clear the stage. In this game, the main character is a bounty hunter named Billy Bob.
Although virtually identical to the NES version, the FDS version featured several differences:
This game, like virtually all other FDS games, feature load times.
The font is similar to what is used in most Capcom games on the Famicom/NES. However, on the NES version, the font is changed to the military-font, also seen in the arcade version.
"In America" is changed to "In 1849". Bandit Bill's mugshot on the wanted poster is slightly different in both versions of the game. In the FDS version, his shirt has an open collar, with part of his body showing. In the NES version, his shirt has a scarf around it. On top of that, the mugshots for the wanted posters originally had an Anime look, whereas in the NES version, they had a realistic look.
In this version, the shopping music features less instruments. Also, many of the tunes featured in the NES version are nowhere to be found in this version, and instead recycle the same music for certain scenes in the game. This is due to the limited memory space in FDS disk cards.
There is no game demonstration like there is in the NES version.
After beating the game the first two times, the player is rewarded with a Japanese message that tells the player to try the game again. After the third time, the player will be rewarded with a simple message that says "THE END". The Japanese message was thrown out in the NES version, instead of being translated into English.

Gun.Smoke de Capcom nos lleva de vuelta a los días de la fiebre del oro, a una pequeña y bulliciosa ciudad minera del Viejo Oeste. ¡Los despiadados bandidos que roban oro aterrorizan a la gente de la ciudad y tú debes detenerlos! Los ladrones son asesinos famosos, y cuando te desafían a un sorteo, ¡están jugando para siempre! Aunque tu destreza para disparar es legendaria, este puede ser el High Noon más difícil que puedas enfrentar. ¡Pero tienes que defenderte, esta ciudad no es lo suficientemente grande para ti y para ellos!
Dans ce jeu, le personnage principal est un chasseur de primes nommé Billy Bob.L'objectif est de libérer la ville de Hicksville de la bande de criminels connus sous le nom de Wingates.

locale.title: Gyruss
locale.synopsis:
Gyruss is a shoot 'em up arcade game designed by Yoshiki Okamoto and released by Konami in 1983. The majority of enemies are spaceships, which must be destroyed to complete a level. They appear either from the centre of the screen or from one of the edges, and move in swirling patterns. They can shoot the player's ship or destroy it by contact. They hover near the centre of the screen after completing their deployment pattern, and occasionally fly outwards and shoot at the player. If not destroyed by the player, the enemy ships gradually fly away one by one.
The gameplay is similar to that of Galaga but presented in a forced 3D perspective, with the player's ship facing 'into' the screen and able to move around the perimeter of an implicit circle. The scrolling starfield of earlier space shooter games is arranged to fit the 3D perspective, with the stars coming into view at the centre of the screen and flying outward, giving the impression of the player's ship moving through space.
Gyruss was also remade for the Family Computer Disk System in Japan, and later the Nintendo Entertainment System in North America, released by Konami's subsidiary Ultra Games. In these versions of the game, the core gameplay is still largely the same, but there are several major revisions. The game was well received in North America. Revisions include:
Updated graphics
Additional control options
The music from the arcade version of the game was slightly remixed, and several additional tracks composed by Atsushi Fujio, Yuichi Sakakura, and Harumi Ueko were added.
The player starts off at "Three Warps To Neptune" instead of "Two Warps"
The player can use a super phaser attack in addition to the normal guns
There are additional enemies, including boss fights when the player reaches each planet
Bonus stages after each planet's boss is defeated, for a chance to gain additional powerups
There is a definite ending to the game. In the NES version, it's a brief text about the Universe being at peace. In the FDS version, there is a full ending sequence with credits.
In addition to the satellites providing the usual double guns and bonus points, they can also provide extra phasers, a smart bomb, and even an extra life
Instead of the arcade's looping 24 stages, there are 39 looping. In the arcade, the player starts from Neptune and proceeds to Earth. On the NES version, the player travels through the entire Solar System, including Neptune, Pluto, Uranus, Saturn, Jupiter, Mars, Earth, Venus, Mercury, and the Sun.
The player can enter the Konami code at the title screen for extra lives, but with a twist: the code must be entered in reverse (A-B-A-B-right-left-right-left-down-down-up-up) instead of in the original sequence.

Es el año 2500 d. C. y la humanidad ha penetrado las franjas de la galaxia, estableciendo colonias de paz desde Mercurio hasta Plutón. De repente, la tranquilidad de la Vía Láctea se convierte en una furia espumeante mientras las armadas de muertes alienígenas invaden nuestro sistema solar como abejas asesinas que se aprovechan de un espectador inocente. Nadie se salva. Incluso la querida Madre Tierra es picada. Estos viscosos visigodos cósmicos son gyrusianos muertos de hambre. Y, dirigidos por el inmortal Genghis Khan , están dispuestos a destruir la civilización. Con nuestra flota galáctica aplanada, eres el vaquero espacial solitario que escapó de la cubierta de Gyruss de la perdición. Ahora debes atravesar la galaxia, liberando planetas atacando innumerables ataques enemigos con Neo-Bomb-Blastic Cannons y Ultra-Lazonic Phasers. Así que prepárate para la pelea de tu vida. ¡Y no te estremeces, o el universo entero se pulverizará!

Gyruss est un shoot 'em up, mais avec une innovation majeure. Après le shoot 'em up à défilement vertical (Space Invaders, Galaxian, Galaga) et à défilement horizontal (Defender), Gyruss introduit le défilement circulaire. Le vaisseau du joueur effectue un parcours circulaire autour des vaisseaux ennemis. Les vaisseaux ennemis apparaissent au centre de l'écran et se positionnent en cercles concentriques.

locale.title: Halley Wars
locale.synopsis:
Its the middle of the 21st century. The armies of Lord Halley are launching attacks on planet Earth. You are the last chance for Earth, piloting a craft specially developed to engage these hordes. You must fight your way through their defenses to the final goal, the alien base. The final battle is about to commence!
Halley Wars is a vertical scrolling shooter. The game has 6 stages set in locations in space such as, above planets or in asteroid fields. There are end of levels bosses at the end of each stage each with their own weaknesses. There are power-ups, which can be picked up along the way when you shoot particular asteroids or satellites. These upgrade your weapon strength, speed, add explosive pods and shields.
Where the game stood out was, there are comets that need to be destroyed on your journey. Each comet and ship that you dont shoot makes it to earth and does some damage there. Comets do more damage than the enemy ships do. If Earths damage level reaches 100% the game is over. For every 2000 points you score, 1% of Earths damage is repaired.

The Halley's Comet regresa del espacio exterior y los científicos de todo el mundo están entusiasmados con este evento. Pero esta vez, las cosas realmente no van de acuerdo con los planes y una flota inesperada de naves espaciales alienígenas aparece detrás del cometa. Su destino es la mejor nave espacial de la Tierra y la Humanidad y el piloto es enviado para contrarrestar el ataque.

Halley Wars est un jeu de tir à défilement vertical. Le jeu a 6 niveaux qui se passent dans des endroits tels que: au-dessus des planètes ou dans les champs d'astéroïdes. Il y a un boss à chaque fin de niveaux chacun avec leurs propres faiblesses. Il y a des power-ups, qui peuvent être ramassés lorsque vous détruisez des astéroïdes ou des satellites. Ceux-ci améliorent votre arme, votre vitesse, ou vous donne un bouclier.

locale.title: Hao-kun no Fushigi na Tabi
locale.synopsis: As my apprentice, you have been studying a long time to master the secrets of magic. Now the time has come to prove yourself. You must journey to the four Mystery Castles in search of four magic talismans. You will face many perils along the way: the castles are riddled with underground passages and intricate mazes, where you may become lost forever! And strange creatures prowl the castles, ready to pounce upon you when you least expect it! But you will find magic powers hidden along the way, to help you in this Mysterious Journey. The magic talismans you seek are the greatest gifts known to man: wealth, wisdom, happiness, and peace. Go now, complete your quest, and prove that you are as great a wizard as I!

Como mi aprendiz, has estado estudiando durante mucho tiempo para dominar los secretos de la magia. Ahora ha llegado el momento de demostrarte a ti mismo. Debes viajar a los cuatro Castillos Misteriosos en busca de cuatro talismanes mágicos. Te enfrentarás a muchos peligros en el camino: los castillos están llenos de pasajes subterráneos y intrincados laberintos, ¡donde puedes perderte para siempre! ¡Y extrañas criaturas merodean por los castillos, listas para abalanzarse sobre ti cuando menos lo esperes! Pero encontrarás poderes mágicos escondidos en el camino, para ayudarte en este misterioso viaje. Los talismanes mágicos que buscas son los mejores regalos conocidos por el hombre: riqueza, sabiduría, felicidad y paz. Ve ahora, completa tu búsqueda y demuestra que eres un gran mago como yo.

En tant qu'apprenti, vous avez étudié longtemps pour maîtriser les secrets de la magie. Le moment est venu faire vos preuves. Vous devez voyager vers les quatre châteaux mystérieux à la recherche de quatre talismans magiques. Vous serez confrontés à de nombreux périls: les châteaux sont criblés de passages souterrains et de labyrinthes complexes, où vous pouvez vous perdre pour toujours! Les étranges créatures qui rôdent dans les châteaux sont prêtes à bondir sur vous quand vous vous y attendez le moins!.

locale.title: Hikari Shinwa - Palthena no Kagami
locale.synopsis:
In a time where humans and gods coexisted in harmony, the kingdom of Angel Land was ruled by two goddesses, Palutena the Goddess of Light and Medusa the Goddess of Darkness. While Palutena administered the light and helped the mortals cultivate their crops, Medusa despised the mortals and used the darkness to destroy their crops and turn the mortals into stone. Enraged, Palutena transformed Medusa into a hideous monster and banished her into the dark Underworld.
But Medusa would not go quietly. She assembled an army of monsters and evil spirits of the underworld to conquer Palutena's home, the Palace in the Sky. War erupted and Medusa's minions overwhelmed Palutena's army, eventually imprisoning the Goddess of Light. Medusa then seized the Three Sacred Treasuresâthe Mirror Shield, the Arrow of Light, and the Wings of Pegasusâand gave them to her most powerful minions.
Defeated and imprisoned, Palutena's only hope was to seek the help of Pit, a young angel trapped in the Underworld. Using the last of her strength, she sent Pit a magical bow. Thus, Pit set out on a quest to escape the Underworld, retrieve the Sacred Treasures that would help him defeat Medusa, and rescue Palutena and restore peace to Angel Land.
The original Famicom Disk System versions feature save slots, unlike the North American version which uses a password system (known in-game as "Sacred Words"). As with Metroid, the FDS version of Kid Icarus also features higher-quality music and sound effects that take advantage of the system's additional sound channels.

Muy lejos, en un reino llamado "Tierra del Ángel", la diosa malvada Medusa robó los Tres Tesoros Sagrados y encarceló a la diosa de la luz, Palutena. Como Kid Icarus, tu misión es encontrar los tesoros, destruir Medusa y rescatar a Palutena de las profundidades del Palacio en el Cielo. Para encontrar los tesoros, viajarás por las ruinas recolectando armas y almacenando poder para usar en el combate contra las criaturas del ejército de Medusa. Usa tu arco y tu flecha para alejar a los guardianes del inframundo, el supremo mundo y el mundo del cielo mientras te esfuerzas por luchar contra Medusa. ¿Sobrevivirás para restaurar la luz de Palutena y devolverla a "Tierra del Ángel"? ¡Solo tu sabes!

À une époque où les hommes et les dieux vivaient en harmonie, deux déesses régnaient sur le Royaume des Anges : Palutena, celle de la Lumière et Médusa, celle des Ténèbres. Palutena fournit la lumière et aide les mortels pour leurs récoltes ; Médusa, elle, les méprise, utilise l'obscurité pour détruire leurs récoltes et les transforme en pierre. Furieuse, Palutena a transformé Médusa en un monstre hideux et l'a bannie dans le monde des Ténèbres.nnMais Médusa ne veut pas se laisser faire. Elle réunit alors une armée de monstres et de démons afin de conquérir le territoire de Palutena, le Palais des Cieux. La guerre éclate et les troupes de Médusa l'emportent sur celles de Palutena ; cette dernière est emprisonnée. Médusa saisit les trois Trésors Sacrés : le bouclier Miroir, la flèche de Lumière et l'aile de Pégase, et les confie à ses trois meilleurs vassaux.nnDéfaite et emprisonnée, Palutena n'a plus qu'un seul espoir : obtenir l'aide de Pit, un jeune ange retenu aux Enfers. Utilisant ses dernières ressources, Palutena envoie à Pit un arc magique. C'est ainsi que ce dernier entame sa quête visant à s'échapper des Enfers, récupérer les Trésors Sacrés qui l'aideront à battre Médusa, sauver Palutena et restaurer la paix au Royaume des Anges.

locale.title: Hikaru Genji - Roller Panic
locale.synopsis: A text adventure game in which your goal in the game is to outfit all 7 band members with roller skates to make the big gig at the arena.

Tu objetivo en el juego es equipar a los 7 miembros de la banda con patines para hacer el gran concierto en la arena. Creo que puedes abordar la parte de cada miembro de la banda en cualquier orden, pero si tienes problemas simplemente sigue el mismo flujo que en el tutorial a continuación. Puedes cambiar los personajes mientras estás en el juego.
Un jeu d'aventure en texte dans lequel votre objectif est d'équiper les 7 membres d'un groupe avec des patins à roulettes.

game.name: I Am A Teacher - Super Mario No Sweater

locale.title: I Am A Teacher - Super Mario No Sweater
locale.synopsis: I Am a Teacher: Super Mario Sweater was designed to be a sewing simulator. Players were able to design sweaters, adding pictures of famous characters such as Mario,Luigi, Peach and Bowser in the process. It was devised by Royal industries Co. Ltd., a Japanese appliance and sewing machine company. Royal industries Co. Ltd. realized that they could profit from a sweater-design program, which led to the development of this game.

Super Mario Sweater fue diseñado para ser un simulador de costura. Los jugadores pudieron diseñar suéteres y agregar imágenes de personajes famosos como Mario, Luigi, Peach y Bowser en el proceso. Fue diseñado por Royal Industries Co. Ltd., una empresa japonesa de electrodomésticos y máquinas de coser.nnnnRoyal Industries Co. Ltd. se dio cuenta de que podían sacar provecho de un programa de diseño de suéter, que condujo al desarrollo de este juego. La compañía finalmente hizo una versión del juego en la vida real.

I Am a Teacher: Super Mario est un simulateur de couture. Le joueur peu concevoir des chandails, en ajoutant des images de personnages célèbres tels que Mario, Luigi, Peach et Bowser . Il a été conçu par Royal Industries Co. Ltd., une société japonaise d'appareils ménagers et de machines à coudre.

locale.title: I Am a Teacher : Super Mario no Sweater

game.name: I Am A Teacher - Teami No Kiso

locale.title: I Am A Teacher - Teami No Kiso
locale.synopsis:
I Am A Teacher: Teami no Kiso (roughly "I Am A Teacher: The Basics of Hand-Knitting") is an instructional tool to help would-be knitters create their own garments. The user can input the amount, length and type of wool they have and the size and type of the item of clothing they wish to create and the program will put together a guide to help them achieve this goal. The user can save their progress at any time and pick up from where they left off.
Unlike Super Mario no Sweater, its predecessor in the I Am A Teacher series, there are no Nintendo characters present in Teami no Kiso. Rather, Teami no Kiso is a guide for teaching the fundamentals of knitting to novices, with Super Mario no Sweater intended for those who already have some experience who wish to try new Mario-themed designs.
As with Super Mario no Sweater, Teami no Kiso was commissioned by major Japanese wool and sewing products manufacturer Royal Kougyou, but it's believed that Nintendo developed and published the game themselves.

Es una herramienta de instrucción para ayudar a los posibles tejedores a crear sus propias prendas. El usuario puede ingresar la cantidad, longitud y tipo de lana que tiene y el tamaño y tipo de la prenda de vestir que desea crear, y el programa elaborará una guía para ayudarlos a lograr este objetivo. El usuario puede guardar su progreso en cualquier momento y continuar desde donde lo dejó.nn

I Am A Teacher: Teami no Kiso (grossièrement «Je suis un enseignant: les bases du tricot à la main») est un outil pédagogique pour aider les futurs tricoteurs à créer leurs propres vêtements. L'utilisateur peut entrer la quantité, la longueur et le type de laine et la taille et le type de l'article qu'ils souhaitent créer et le programme mettra en place un guide pour les aider à atteindre cet objectif.

locale.title: I Am a Teacher : Teami no Kiso
Ice Climber
locale.synopsis:
The plot is simple: the Condor has stolen the food supply from the neighboring village and takes it to his nest on the mountain nearby. So it's up to Nana and Popo to climb up the ice-covered top of the mountain to get the vegetables back from Condor. You'll do this by hopping up platforms while avoiding various enemies and obstacles before your time runs out.
Interestingly the Famicom Disk System port is actually based on the arcade version Vs. Ice Climber and differs from the console version in ways such as an animated title screen, stage select menu, 16 additional mountains, occasional blizzard and wind effects, more enemy characters, and bonus multiplier items.

Si puedes atravesar 8 niveles de traicionero hielo ártico, ¡llegarás a la cima de la montaña! Pero ten cuidado. Los Nitpickers, Cóndores y Ploar Bears no te quieren allí arriba. Y tienen una bolsa de trucos que pondrán a prueba cada onza de tu fuerza y ??coraje. ¿Vas a dejar que te detengan? ¡De ninguna manera! ¡Hay 32 montañas para elegir e infinitas emociones mientras luchas contra estas criaturas árticas solo o con un amigo, y ascender a la cima de la montaña en ICE CLIMBER!

Le sujet est simple: le Condor a volé la nourriture du village voisin et l'emmène à son nid sur la montagne voisine. C'est donc à Nana et à Popo de monter en haut de la montagne pour la récupérer. Vous allez le faire en sautant sur des plateformes tout en évitant divers ennemis et obstacles avant que le temps ne s'épuise.

locale.title: Ice Hockey
locale.synopsis: The play and mechanics of Ice Hockey are mostly similar to that of ice hockey in real life. The objective for both team is to hit a black puck with a hockey stick that each player carries into the opponent's goal. Teams are made up of five players including the goaltender, as opposed to six in real life. Players wear ice skates, which are used to skate across the icy arena. Each game is made up of three periods, with the victory going to the team who has the most points at the end of the game. At the beginning, two opposing players from each team face off in the middle of the rink. There are three kinds of players - the first is fast, weak, and feeble, but is good at the face-off; the second is average in all qualities, and the third is slow and poor at the face-off, but very powerful, both in body checking and shooting strength. The arena is similarly designed to a real-world ice hockey arena. The arena is coated in ice, with a goal on either side of the arena. There are a variety of marked areas, including the goal line that the puck must cross to score, the attacking/defending zone which is situated closely to each goal, the face-off spot, the neutral spot, and others. Each side of the arena has exactly the same design. If two opposing players fight for the puck for a certain amount of time, other players join into the fight, resulting in the player from the losing team in the fight to be put in the penalty box for a period of time.

Es un rápido skatin ', control de cadera, acción de alto puntaje. Dirige a tu equipo hacia el centro del hielo, sobre la línea azul del oponente. Pasa al punto y configura para la punta en - ¡Puntuación! Elige un país para ti y tu oponente, selecciona un nivel de juego y enfréntate en el hielo central para convertirte en el máximo goleador en el Hockey sobre hielo de Nintendo. Recibe una multa y prueba tu defensa. O ataca un juego de poder y usa tus habilidades de manejo del disco para atrapar a tus oponentes con la guardia baja. De cualquier forma, ¡puedes convertirte en una superestrella en la liga de Nintendo Ice Hockey!

Le gameplay de Ice Hockey est semblable à celui du hockey sur glace dans la vraie vie. Les équipes sont constituées de cinq joueurs dont le gardien de but, contre six dans la vraie vie. Chaque jeu se compose de trois périodes.Il existe trois types de joueurs - le premier est rapide et bon dans les duels ; le second est moyen dans tous les domaines, et le troisième est lent et mauvaise dans les duels, mais très puissant.

game.name: Idol Hotline - Nakayama Miho No Tokimeki High School

locale.title: Idol Hotline - Nakayama Miho no Tokimeki High Scho
locale.synopsis: The game's protagonist enters Tokimeki High School and runs into a girl wearing glasses who looks identical to Miho Nakayama. Though the game is a standard text command-style adventure game similar to the Famicom Tantei Club series, in important scenes, the player is required to select a facial expression in addition to a verbal response. The four expressions (straight face, laughter, sadness, anger) must match the content of the response being given, and any incorrect responses immediately lead to the "game over" screen. This increased the game's difficulty considerably in comparison to other text adventure games where there were fewer incorrect choices. Some scenes specifically require that the dialogue not match with the expression. For instance, choosing a dialogue expressing joy with a straight face may be the correct choice in a certain situation because it represents a deeper level of emotion and thought on the part of the protagonist. This system allowed the game to simulate a level of complexity resembling actual love relationships, leading to its classification as a dating simulation rather than an adventure game. The game has two different endings, depending on the choices made during the game, and the prizes receivable via the Disk Fax network differed for each ending.

nnEl juego comienza con tu personaje, cuya familia acaba de mudarse al área, ingresando a su nueva escuela por primera vez. Después de la clase, accidentalmente te encuentras con una chica de aspecto conservador con gafas. Ella se presenta como Mizuho, ??pero no puedes dejar de notar su sorprendente parecido con el ídolo pop de tus sueños, Miho Nakayama. Recoges un amuleto de la buena suerte que Mizuho dejó caer para devolverle, y luego hizo una revelación sorprendente: ¡tu hermano fotógrafo sacó una foto de Miho con el mismo encanto! Vas a la sala de música para confrontarla con esta evidencia, y aquí es donde comienza el verdadero desafío del juego.

le joueur entre à la Tokimeki High School et se heurte à une jeune fille. Si le jeu est un jeu d'aventure en texte standard semblable à la série Famicom Tantei Club.Dans les scènes importantes, le joueur doit choisir une expression faciale en plus d'une réponse verbale. Les quatre expressions (visage impassible, rire, tristesse, colère) doivent correspondre au contenu de la réponse donnée, et toutes les réponses incorrectes conduisent immédiatement à l'écran « game over ». Cela augmente la difficulté du jeu par rapport à d'autres jeux d'aventure texte où il y avait moins de choix incorrects. Le jeu a deux fins différentes, selon les choix effectués au cours de la partie.

locale.title: Nakayama Miho no Tokimeki High School
Igo - Kyuu Roban Taikyoku
locale.synopsis:
Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku is the first real attempt to bring the Japanese board game Go to a home console, namely the Famicom. The game was designed by Henk Rogers, a Dutch programmer who would play games of Go against the CEO (at the time) of Nintendo, Hiroshi Yamauchi. It was during one such game that the prospect of developing such a title for the Famicom was discussed. It was later converted from disk format to cartridge and release in August 1987.
Prior to the release of this game, Nintendo had released a game which was played on the Go board in 1983, known as Gomoku Narabe Renju, but the play mechanics were more akin to "Connect Four" (or five, as it were). The real game of Go is traditionally played on a 19 Ã 19 grid, but the permutations of possibilities would take too long for the Famicom's processor to consider, so the board size has been significantly reduced to a 9 Ã 9 grid, which allows for a smoother single player experience. The game also features a lesson mode, in which ninjas appear to teach the player about the rules and strategy of the game.
Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku tiene un crédito para Edge Computing en su pantalla de título; se supone que parte de la codificación del juego fue tomada del juego Edge C64, Micro Go.

Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku est la première véritable tentative de portage d'un jeu de société japonais sur une console de salon. Le jeu de Go est traditionnellement joué sur une grille de 19 × 19, mais les permutations de possibilités prendraient trop de temps pour le processeur de la console , donc la taille du plateau a été considérablement réduite à une grille 9 × 9. Le jeu comporte également un mode de leçon, dans lequel les ninjas enseignent au joueur les règles du jeu.

locale.title: Ishido
locale.synopsis:
Ishido is a puzzle board game consisting of a set of 72 stones and a game board of 96 squares.
Every stone has two attributes: a color and a symbol. There are six colors and six symbols in each stone set, thus creating 36 unique stones. Since each stone comes in a pair, there are therefore 72 stones in each stone set.
The primary objective of Ishido is to place all 72 stones onto the board of 96 squares. The challenge arises because stones must be placed adjacent to others that they match, either by color or symbol. When the board begins to fill up, this objective is not so easily accomplished.
A valuable move is the 4-way, in which a stone is placed in the midst of four others, two of which are matched by color, and two which are matched by symbol.
Ishido comes with 6 differently themed stone sets, 5 different game boards, and a variety of Oriental chimes and sound effects.

Presentamos a Ishido, el antiguo e intrincado Juego de las Piedras. Debes colocar piedras en el tablero de juego, haciendo coincidir los colores y los patrones de acuerdo con las reglas centenarias. Requiere gran habilidad y concentración, pero si puedes descubrir el secreto del Oráculo, ¡su sabiduría te ayudará!

Dans Ishido, l'ancien et complexe Jeu vous devez placer des pierres sur un plateau. Cela requiert beaucoup d'habileté et de concentration mais si vous pouvez déverrouiller le secret de l'Oracle, sa sagesse vous aidera!

game.name: Jaaman Tanteidan Marine Kumi - Maruhi Jigoma Sousa

locale.title: Jaaman Tanteidan Marine Kumi - Maruhi Jigoma Sousa
locale.synopsis: Jaaman Tanteidan: Matonarikumi (also known as Jaaman Tanteidan Marine Kumi: Maruhi Jigoma Sousa File) is an adventure game from Bandai that uses the license of a TV show that was also the basis of Bandai's earlier action game Omoikkiri Tanteidan Haado Gumi: Matenrou no Chousenjou. Both games feature teams of schoolchildren detectives as they hunt down an elusive thief in a mask and cape.The game follows a sub-genre of Japanese adventure games that include a top-down RPG style world map to walk around on, rather than simply selecting destinations from a menu. Otherwise the game is similar to other NES Portopia/Tantei Club-derived detective adventure games; the player must search for clues, talk to witnesses and suspects and solve inventory-based puzzles in order to proceed.
¡Conviértase en el detective como se ve en la televisión! Jigoma está suelto y debes ayudar a atraparlo. ¡Usa todas las pistas, presta atención a las pistas y haz justicia al villano del día!

Jaaman Tanteidan : Matonarikumi (également connu sous le nom Jaaman Tanteidan Marine Kumi : Mercier Jigoma Sousa File) est un jeu d'aventure qui utilise la licence d'une émission de télévision qui était également la base du jeu d'action Omoikkiri Tanteidan Haado Gumi : Matenrou aucun Chousenjou.Dans ce jeu une équipe d écoliers détectives traquent un voleur insaisissable.

locale.title: Jikai Shounen Metmag
locale.synopsis: The player must go around each stage and collect every sphere in order to progress. Each sphere can change the polarity of the character from red to blue and vice versa. Each stage is littered with blue and red arrows: Being the same color as these arrows will magnetize the player character, which has different effects depending on the direction the arrow is pointing: For instance, an arrow pointing down will push the player to the ground if they are the reverse color but a same-colored character can hover across as the blocks will hold them up. Conversely, an arrow pointing up will allow players of the opposite color to jump far higher from the arrow, but will almost entirely eliminate the jumping power of a same-colored character as it pulls them down.

El jugador debe resolver 100 rompecabezas en forma de habitaciones que contienen cuadrados magnetizados. El jugador asume una polaridad de imán Norte o Sur a medida que recoge todos los orbes de polaridad en cada habitación antes de intentar alcanzar la salida. La polaridad del jugador afecta la forma en que él o ella interactúa con los cuadrados magnetizados lo que puede permitir u obstaculizar al jugador en su progreso a través del nivel.

Le joueur doit collecter toutes les sphères afin de progresser. Chaque sphère peut changer la polarité du caractère du rouge au bleu et inversement. Chaque niveau est jonchée de flèches bleues et rouges: la même couleur que ces flèches va magnétiser le personnage du joueur, qui a des effets différents selon le sens de la flèche: Par exemple, une flèche vers le bas poussera le joueur au sol Si elles sont la couleur bleue,un personnage de même couleur peut voler. Inversement, une flèche pointant vers le haut permettra aux joueurs de la couleur opposée de sauter beaucoup plus haut.
jeu de logique entièrement en japonais.

locale.title: Kaettekita Mario Bros.
locale.synopsis:
Kaettekita Mario Bros. ("The Return of Mario Bros.") is an updated rerelease of the original Mario Bros. arcade game, which was one of the first games to be ported to the NES console. It adds a few new features to the format, including improved controls for Mario, cutscenes and the ability to save high scores with the Famicom Disk Reader's save function, but is otherwise identical.
The game was part of the Disk Writer system in Japan, where players could write new games over old Famicom disks at special machine vendors found in video game stores and other likely locales. This made the games cheaper to buy (as it minimized production costs) but also made games that were exclusive to this service, such as Kaettekita Mario Bros, harder to find for collectors.
Inexplicably, the game also has a sponsor: Nagatanien, a Japanese producer of seasonings for rice and noodle dishes. Mario had also previously appeared on Nagatanien Japanese TV commercials. This makes Kaettekita Mario Bros. an early example of an advergame.
The European version of Mario Bros., named Mario Bros. Classic, was based off this game rather than the NES original.

Kaettekita Mario Bros. (Return of Mario Bros.) es una versión revisada de la versión original de arcade de 1983. Una exclusiva japonesa para el sistema de disco Famicom, fue lanzada en 1988 y solo estaba disponible a través del servicio de quiosco Disk Writer, donde los jugadores podían borrar un juego que tenían y usar ese disco para comprar, entre otros, este título por 400 yenes.

Kaettekita Mario Bros. est un remake mis à jour de la version NES originale de Mario Bros. Alors que la conversion NES originale, développée en 1983, était Assez fidele à la version d'arcade sur laquelle il était basé, beaucoup de compromis ont été faits pour adapter le jeu dans une quantité limitée de mémoire.

game.name: Kamen Rider Black - Taiketsu Shadow Moon

locale.title: Kamen Rider Black - Taiketsu Shadow Moon
locale.synopsis: The game is based on the Kamen Rider Black television series, which was the eight installment of the Kamen Rider superhero series.In the game, players take control of Kamen Rider Black, who must defeat numerous Gorgom mutants. There are five levels of four stages each. In the first four levels, players must complete three side scrolling stages with a boss at the end. In the fourth stage, the player must fight against a final level boss using a zoomed in perspective with larger sprites. The player gets to ride Battle Hopper motorcycle throughout the second and fourth levels. The fifth level is composed entirely of boss fights, first against three Evil Lords, and then against Shadow Moon. If the player loses against Shadow Moon, the bad ending is shown before the game ends.

Kamen Rider Black debe derrotar a los mutantes del culto de Gorgom y a Shadow Moon, el gemelo con el cerebro lavado de Kamen Rider Black en emocionantes batallas contra jefes uno a uno. Kamen Rider Black se enfrenta a sus enemigos no solo a pie, sino también con su Hopper de batalla sobre obstáculos antes de llegar a la siguiente batalla con el jefe.

Le jeu est basé sur la série Kamen Rider Black. Dans le jeu, le joueur prend le contrôle de Kamen Rider Black, qui doit vaincre de nombreux mutants Gorgom. Il y a cinq niveaux de quatre étapes chacun. Dans les quatre premiers niveaux, le joueur doit effectuer trois étapes avec un boss à la fin. Dans la quatrième étape, le joueur doit lutter contre un boss de niveau final. Le joueur monte la moto Battle Hopper pendant les deuxième et quatrième niveaux. Le cinquième niveau est entièrement composé de combats de boss, d'abord contre trois Evil Lords, puis contre Shadow Moon.

locale.title: Kamen Rider Black : Taiketsu Shadow Moon
Karate Champ
locale.synopsis:
The player assumes the role of a karate competitor and fights against another player or the computer. Using two joysticks, players can execute a number of moves.
Gameplay consists of a two dimensional fight between Karate characters wearing white and red gi, followed by various bonus rounds for the successful player. This pattern repeats itself in the next, more challenging round set against a new background. Unlike most later fighter-type games, there are no health bar or hit points. A hit successfully landed ends the round and earns the player or his opponent either one point or half point (along with a numeric score for the top ten but this has no effect on winning a match per se). The first to score two points is the winner. If the player loses a battle, the game ends. The game also featured some early speech synthesis, in which the judge would call out such phrases as "Fight!" or "Winner!" It's also spoken in Japanese in the Japanese version.

Tu campeonato de karate está en juego. ¿Puedes dominar todas las estocadas, patadas, giros, volteretas, barridos de pies, golpes inversos y bloques defensivos necesarios para conservar tu título? ¡Muévete rápido y juega inteligentemente o te aplastarán antes de que puedas gruñir! Compite contra un amigo o desafía a la computadora. Nueve escenarios pintorescos diferentes (más tres desafiantes pantallas de bonificación) proporcionan los fondos para tus partidos. Hiiiiieeeeeooooo!
Le joueur est un compétiteur de karaté et se bat contre un autre joueur ou l'ordinateur. En utilisant deux joysticks, les joueurs peuvent exécuter un certain nombre de mouvements.

locale.title: Kattobi! Douji
locale.synopsis: A card battle baseball game based on a popular manga at the time.
Basado en el manga popular Kenji Takaya. Participe en un juego de béisbol con el exclusivo sistema de juego de cartas. 3 golpes y estás fuera!
Un jeu de de bataille de carte de baseball de basé sur un manga populaire.

locale.title: Kick and Run
locale.synopsis: A soccer game based on the arcade game of the same name.

¡FELICITA TU DINERO Y ALCANZA TU META CON UN JUEGO QUE ES UN ENCABEZADO POR ENCIMA DEL RESTO!
Un juego de alta tecnología con características de juego realistas, desafiando tu camino a través de los torneos internacionales haciendo el mejor uso de las características de cada equipo y utilizando las habilidades de juego en equipo, así como el juego individual.
Este juego de fútbol publicado por Taito, lanzado en arcades en 1986 y para el sistema de disco Famicom en 1988. No fue lanzado fuera de Japón.
Un jeu de football basé sur le jeu d'arcade du même nom.

game.name: Kick Challenger Air Foot - Yasai No Kuni No Ashi Senshi

locale.title: Kick Challenger Air Foot - Yasai no Kuni no Ashi S
locale.synopsis:
Kick Challenger - Air Foot - Yasai no Kuni no Ashi Senshi (lit. Kick Challenger: Air Foot: Vegetable Country Foot Soldier) is an action game developed by Vap for the Famicom Disk System and published in 1987. It is a single player game where the player takes control of a tomato as he marches upward through four stages in an effort to rescue his country from insects and other invaders.
You control the tomato by independently directing his two feet, one foot at a time. He make kick in eight directions with whichever foot is not planted in the ground at the given moment. Power ups are revealed by kicking trees, flowers, mushrooms, and other obstacles that are scattered throughout each stage. They may take the form of shoes which grant him the ability move on certain surfaces, or candy which gives him special abilities. Each stage has a "back side" which is accessed by stepping on holes in the ground reveal under kicked obstacles, and provide more power-ups to find.

Controla el tomate dirigiendo independientemente sus dos pies, un pie a la vez. Él patea en ocho direcciones con cualquier pie que no esté plantado en el suelo en el momento dado. Los power-ups se revelan al patear árboles, flores, hongos y otros obstáculos que se encuentran dispersos en cada etapa. Pueden tomar la forma de zapatos que le otorgan la habilidad de moverse en ciertas superficies, o dulces que le otorgan habilidades especiales. Cada etapa tiene una "parte posterior" a la que se accede al pisar los agujeros en el suelo para revelar los obstáculos pateados y proporcionar más potenciadores para encontrar.
Un jeu solo où le joueur prend le contrôle d'une tomate alors qu'il marche vers le haut à travers quatre niveaux dans le but de sauver son pays des insectes autres envahisseurs.

locale.title: Kieta Princess
locale.synopsis:
The Kingdom of Rabia's princess goes missing during a visit to Japan, surrounding the investigation of the medicine to an "epidemic dementia," known as "Oninofuguri", and the prevention of its importing. The player takes the role of a detective determined to unravel the mystery of the missing princess Kilala, in this RPG style adventure game. Yasuko Tomita served as the model of one of the characters. Certain telephone numbers would appear, which, if called, would provide the player with a hint, spoken by Yasuko Tomita.
In order to track down Kobayashi, the criminal protagonist, you must visit five different towns and collect information. Neary every house and building can be entered, which was unique for its time. The game also features a high degree of freedom, allowing you to visit restaurants for a bite, or a Dojo to train, or to hunt for vegetation to sell for money, while you are looking for the princess.
Another introduced concept that was novel for its time was the notion of day and night changing the appearance of the city. During the evening, you may encounter a street gang, and they may open fire on you, although you can defend yourself with a revolver. However, if over 20 innocent people are gunned down, you will be arrested and sent to the police station where you must pay a fine and return to the starting point.
The degree of difficult throughout the game is considered quite high, with very few hints to help you out, while other hints are misleading. For example, one hint suggests that you if you sleep over night at a particular crossroad in a city, you will get a key item, but this hint is false. Although you are supposedly a detective, you never actually get to accuse anyone of a crime.

El jugador es un detective que busca pistas sobre la desaparición de la princesa del mismo nombre.
El juego fue lanzado originalmente con un libro de cuentos y cintas de cassette de audio, "feelies" que mejoraron la comprensión y apreciación del jugador de la trama del juego, además de ayudar con algunos de los acertijos. Existe una cantidad considerable de diálogo japonés dentro del juego propiamente dicho, por lo que solo alguien que domine el idioma podrá progresar.

Le joueur prend le rôle d'un détective déterminé à démêler le mystère de la princesse disparue Kilala, dans ce jeu d'aventure de style RPG. Yasuko Tomita a servi de modèle à l'un des personnages. Des numéros de téléphone apparaissent pendant le jeu si le joueur les appelait ils avaient un indice donné par Yasuko Tomita.

locale.title: Kikikai-kai - Dotou Hen
locale.synopsis: The game follows the adventures of "Sayo-chan", a young Shinto shrine maiden living in Feudal Japan. One night, while Sayo-chan is fanning a ceremonial fire, she is visited by the Seven Lucky Gods, who warn her of a great, impending danger. Suddenly, a band of mischievous goblins appear and kidnap the gods, quickly retreating to a faraway mountain range. Sayo-chan, determined to help the gods, sets off on a journey across the countryside, where she confronts a number of strange creatures from Japanese mythology, including yokai, obake, and yurei-like monsters. After defeating several powerful goblin leaders, Sayo must battle their leader, the ancient serpent Orochi.

En la noche, mientras Sayo-chan aviva un fuego ceremonial, recibe la visita de los Siete Dioses Suertudos, que le advierten sobre un gran peligro inminente. De repente, una banda de traviesos duendes aparecen y secuestran a los dioses, retirándose rápidamente a una cadena montañosa lejana. Sayo-chan, decidida a ayudar a los dioses, emprende un viaje por el campo, donde se enfrenta a una serie de extrañas criaturas de la mitología japonesa, incluidos yokai, obake y monstruos de yurei. Después de derrotar a varios poderosos líderes duendes, Sayo debe luchar contra su líder, la antigua serpiente Orochi.

Le jeu suit les aventures de 'Sayo-chan', une jeune fille de temple Shinto vivant dans le Japon féodal. Une nuit, alors que Sayo-chan souffle sur un feu de cérémonie, elle est visité par les Sept Dieux de la chance, qui l'avertissent d'un grand danger imminent. Soudain, une bande de lutins malicieux apparaissent et kidnappent les dieux, se retirant rapidement vers une montagne lointaine. Sayo-chan, déterminée à aider les dieux, se lance dans un voyage à travers la campagne, où elle combat un certain nombre d'étranges créatures de la mythologie japonaise, yokai, obake et yurei. Après avoir battu plusieurs leaders gobelins , Sayo doit affronter leur chef, l'ancien serpent Orochi.

locale.title: Kind Gal's
locale.synopsis: Kind Gals is an adventure game for adults developed and published by Hacker International for the Famicom Disk System in 1987. In this visual novel type of game, you try to figure your way to the heart of either Ryoko, Maiko, Reiko or Akabe.
Calcula tu camino al corazón de Ryoko, Maiko, Reiko o Akabe.

Kind Gals est un jeu d'aventure pour adultes développé et édité par Hacker International pour la Famicom Disk System en 1987. Dans ce jeu type roman photo, vous essayez de gagner le coeur de Ryoko, Maiko, Reiko ou Akabe.

locale.title: Kinetic Connection
locale.synopsis: A Disk Writer only release, The Monitor Puzzle Kinetic Connection - Kineco II is the sequel in which new puzzles are introduced. Like it's prequel the game challenges player to piece together ten images in a jigsaw puzzle like fashion. However, every piece is exactly the same size, and the images on the pieces move. Rather than using the shape of the edges to determine what pieces fit next to one another, you must use the animation on the pieces to determine their arrangement. When each puzzle begins, the pieces are also oriented randomly, so you may be required to flip them vertically or horizontally in order to complete the puzzle. There are 10 different animations, and you can choose between dividing the images into 16, 24, or 48 distinct pieces before attempting to solve the puzzle. Obviously, the fewer pieces, the easier it is to solve.
Un juego de rompecabezas de imágenes similar a un rompecabezas, excepto que la imagen que crea está animada. Fue publicado por Irem en Japón solo para el Sistema de Disco Famicom.

Un jeu de puzzle, où le joueur doit assembler dix images. Cependant, chaque morceau est exactement de la même taille, et les images sur les pièces se déplacent. Plutôt que d'utiliser la forme des bords pour déterminer quelles pièces s'ajustent l'une à côté de l'autre, vous devez utiliser l'animation sur les pièces pour déterminer leur arrangement. Quand chaque puzzle commence, les morceaux sont également orientés aléatoirement, ainsi vous devez les orienter de la bonne façon pour compléter le puzzle. Il y a 10 animations différentes, et vous pouvez choisir entre diviser les images en 16, 24 ou 48 pièces distinctes avant de tenter de résoudre le puzzle. Évidemment, moins il y a de morceaux, plus il est facile de le résoudre.

locale.title: Kinnikuman - Kinnikusei Oui Soudatsusen
locale.synopsis: Kinnikuman - Kinnikusei Oui Soudatsusen is a wrestling game based on the popular toy line, manga and anime about a klutzy superhero who fights most of his opponents with professional wrestling moves. The first Kinnikuman game (released as M.U.S.C.L.E. in the US) was a straightforward wrestling game, but this sequel changes the action to a side-scrolling action brawler game with additional RPG and story elements. The main character can still use wrestling moves on enemies, but most of the attacks are simple punches and kicks.Curiously, the boss music is a sped up version of "In-A-Gadda-Da-Vida" by Iron Butterfly.

Siendo el único dos veces campeón en la historia de los Juegos Olímpicos de Chojin y habiendo derrotado a los Akuma Chojins, los Devil Knights, y habiendo ganado el Dream Choujin Tag Tournament contra los Perfect Choujins, Kinniku Suguru había demostrado ser digno de hacerse cargo de su el trono del padre Sin embargo, los 5 dioses malvados temían que Kinnikuman tomando el trono sería una amenaza para sus malvados planes.
¡LUCHA! Y ayuda a Suguru a tomar el lugar que le corresponde en el trono.

Kinnikuman - Kinnikusei Oui Soudatsusen est un jeu de lutte basé sur la ligne de jouets populaire et manga sur un super héros klutzy qui combat la plupart de ses adversaires avec des mouvements de lutte professionnelle. Le premier jeu de Kinnikuman (sorti en tant que M. U. S. C. L. E. aux États-Unis) était un jeu de lutte direct, mais cette suite change l'action en un jeu de combat latéral avec des éléments supplémentaires de RPG et d'histoire. Le personnage principal peut encore utiliser la lutte contre les ennemis, mais la plupart des attaques sont simples coups de poing et de coups de pied. Curieusement, la musique de boss est une version accélérée de 'In-A-Gadda-Da-Vida' de Iron Butterfly.

game.name: Knight Lore - Majou No Ookami Otoko

locale.title: Knight Lore - Majou No Ookami Otoko
locale.synopsis: Knight Lore is a a 3D isometric adventure game by Jaleco, originally released by the British game company Ultimate. Saberman, the hero of the game, has been cursed by an evil wizard. Every night, he turns into a creepy werewolf and he is on a journey to retrieve all the necessary ingredients to create a magic potion. This potion, he hopes, will get him to return to his human shape. The game starts in a dark forest, somewhere in there the wizard awaits for the potion's ingredients such as diamonds, bottles etc... Our hero's task is to wander around and find them, one at the time, and bring them back to him. But our hero must watch out, he turns into a werewolf at night and the wizard won't hesitate to use his magic against him. Saberman must make sure to always approach him as a human. Up to three items can be carried at the same time, they can also be dropped on the ground and climbed to reach higher platforms. However, once a new ingredient is delivered to the wizard, our hero leaves empty handed and lose all stored items. Series of enemies and hazards are of course scattered along his path, such as spirits, spikes or pits. Once all the ingredients are collected, the game jumps to another location where more objects need to be found with meaner hazards and enemies. This is also the point where the player's progress can be saved.

Sabreman ha sido mordido por Sabre Wulf y ahora se transforma en un hombre lobo al caer la noche. Tiene cuarenta días para recoger objetos en un extraño castillo y preparar una cura para su maldición.

Le joueur prend le rôle de Sabreman et doit trouver Melkhior le vieux sorcier et divers objets spéciaux pour son chaudron magique, qui sont dispersés à travers les différentes salles du château éphémère dans lequel le jeu se passe. Si le joueur réussit à récupérer tous les objets demandés dans une période de quarante jours, Sabreman sera libéré de la malédiction de la lycanthropie.

locale.title: Knight Lore : Majou no Ookami Otoko
Knight Move
locale.synopsis:
The game is based around the concept of how a knight piece is moved in the game of chess. The player controls a knight chess piece that is constantly jumping and must continually choose which of the possible legal moves to make before the knight lands back on the board.
When the knight lands on any square on the board, it turns from white to light teal. Landing there again, turns it dark teal. Landing there yet again destroys the square altogether, leaving a hole that the player must avoid. Falling in a hole will result in a game over. Consecutively creating several holes results in a chain increasing the player's score in differing increments.
At the beginning of each "round", a heart is placed somewhere on the board. A heart (or multiple hearts) must be collected to advance to the next round, which thereby replaces all holes on the board with new white squares and places a new heart somewhere on the board. Depending on the game mode, hearts will sometimes move themselves every few jumps of the knight.
The player can also gather a small amount of extra points, at any time, by holding the A button and speeding up the knight's movement. The main objective in Knight Move is to continue this cycle, despite the increasing game speed, and reach the highest score possible.
The game also includes a simultaneous 2 player versus mode similar to the single player modes.

¡Un rompecabezas del creador de Tetris, Alexey Pajitnov! Con una serie de fichas con un solo Caballero de ajedrez, movido por el jugador. Elimina todas las fichas dentro del límite de tiempo con el Knight, solo se puede mover en forma de L.nnnnCuando elimine los azulejos, dejará agujeros que deben evitarse. En etapas posteriores, tendrás que aterrizar en las fichas varias veces antes de que desaparezcan.

Un jeu de puzzle. Doté d'une série de tuiles avec un chevalier d'échecs unique, déplacé par le joueur. Effacez toutes les tuiles dans la limite de temps en utilisant le chevalier.Quand vous nettoyez les tuiles vous laissez des trous derrière qui doivent être évités. Sur les niveaux suivant vous devrez passer sur des tuiles plusieurs fois avant qu'elles ne disparaissent.

Knight Move é um jogo de quebra-cabeça. Apresentando uma série de peças com um cavaleiro de xadrez exclusivo, movido pelo jogador. Apague todas as peças dentro do limite de tempo usando o cavalo Quando você limpa as peças que você deixou para trás buracos que devem ser evitados. Nos níveis subsequentes, você terá que passar as peças várias vezes antes que elas desapareçam.

locale.title: Kobayashi Hitomi no Hold Up
locale.synopsis: Kobayashi Hitomi no Hold Up is a puzzle/shooting for adults developed and published by Hacker International for the Famicom Disk System in 1990. In this solo game, you play a game of Hold Up with the beautiful model Kobayashi Hitomi.
¡Juega un juego de Hold Up con la hermosa modelo Kobayashi Hitomi!

Kobayashi Hitomi no Hold Up est un jeu de puzzle/tir pour adultes développé et édité par Hacker International pour la Famicom Disk System en 1990. Dans ce jeu solo, vous jouez une partie de Hold Up avec la jolie mannequin Kobayashi Hitomi.

locale.title: Kobayashi Hitomi Shocking Tennis
locale.synopsis: Kobayashi Hitomi Shocking Tennis is a tennis game for adults developed and published by Hacker International for the Famicom Disk System in 1990. In this solo game, you play a game of tennis with the beautiful model Kobayashi Hitomi.
¡Juega a un juego de tenis con la bella modelo Kobayashi Hitomi!

Kobayashi Hitomi Shocking Tennis est un jeu de tennis pour adultes développé et édité par Hacker International pour la Famicom Disk System en 1990. Dans ce jeu solo, vous jouez une partie de tennis avec la jolie mannequin Kobayashi Hitomi.

locale.title: Konamic Ice Hockey
locale.synopsis: Blades of Steel, later released in Japan as Konamic Ice Hockey is an ice hockey video game released by Konami for North American arcades in 1987, and ported to the Family Computer Disk System and Nintendo Entertainment System in 1988. All teams are fictional but based out of real Canadian and American cities. The game is known for its fast paced hockey action and especially for the fighting. It is a one or two player game. When playing against the computer, there are three difficulty levels to choose from: Junior, College, and Pro (with Pro being the most difficult and Junior being the easiest). Each team consists of three forwards, two defense men, and a goaltender.

Hay ocho equipos jugables que se basan en ciudades reales de América del Norte, pero no tienen ninguna relación con sus homólogos de la NHL. Los ocho equipos son Vancouver, Edmonton, Toronto, Montreal, Los Ángeles, Minnesota, Chicago y Nueva York. Cada equipo tiene una línea anónima de 3 delanteros, 2 defensores y 1 portero.

Konamic Ice Hockey est un jeu vidéo de hockey sur glace. Toutes les équipes sont fictives, mais viennent de véritables villes canadiennes et américaines. Le jeu est connu pour son actionrapide et surtout pour les combats. C'est un jeu d'un ou deux joueurs. Lors departies contre l'ordinateur, il y a trois niveaux de difficulté à choisir: Junior, Collège et Pro (avec Pro étant le plus difficile et Junior étant le plus facile). Chaque équipe se compose de trois attaquants, deux défenseurs et un gardien de but.

locale.title: Konami Tennis
locale.synopsis:
Konamic Tennis is part of a long line of Konami sports games made specifically for the Famicom and its Famicom Disk System peripheral, which had previously used the term "Exciting" to signify its Konami status: As is the case with games such as Exciting Baseball or Exciting Basketball (known in the west as Double Dribble). Instead, this and future Konami sports games for the system would have the "Konamic" appellation; a portmanteau of "Konami" and "dynamic". At least, this is how the same pun in its original Japanese is commonly transliterated.
Konamic Tennis follows a similar design philosophy as other tennis games at the time (and would be used for most of the ones to follow) by depicting the action from behind the serving player's side of the court. It follows the rules of the sport precisely, with a single game usually ending after four successful volleys (scored as 15, 30, 40 and Game) and the first to win six games deciding a set. Players can choose between a single set match or a longer 3-set match. They can also play in a tournament or a single one-on-one game with a CPU (or human) opponent of their choosing.
One feature Konamic Tennis introduces to the genre is that of the serving view, shown as an inset whenever a player serves the ball to start a game. The goal is to hit the ball at precisely the right moment to serve an excellent shot; too early or too late will cause the player to either hit the net or send the ball too far, or simply not hit the ball at all. In all these cases, it counts as a foul and the player has one more chance to correctly serve the ball, otherwise points are awarded to the opponent.

¡Real rally de tenis, con feroces ratos, poderosos golpes y voleas rápidas! ¡Esto es lo real! Tres desafiantes estilos de juego; ¡Juega un juego de individuales contra la computadora, dos jugadores pueden jugar solos contra otros, o pueden jugar dobles contra la computadora!

Konamic Tennis introduit une nouveauté dans le genre: celle de la vue de service, montrée comme un encart chaque fois qu'un joueur sert. Le but est de frapper la balle au bon moment: Trop tôt ou trop tard fera le joueur soit toucher le filet ou envoyer la balle trop loin, ou tout simplement louper la balle. Dans ce cas, cela compte comme une faute et le joueur a une autre chance de servir correctement, sinon le point est attribué à l'adversaire.

game.name: Koneko Monogatari - The Adventures Of Chatran

locale.title: Koneko Monogatari - The Adventures of Chatran
locale.synopsis: Koneko Monogatari: The Adventures of Chatran is a game developed for the Family Computer Disk System in 1986 by Pony Canyon and the NES in 1987. It is actually a movie license title based on the cinema release of Koneko Monogatari, better known in the United States as The Adventures of Milo and The video game representation of this movie is quite different, and regretfully slow. It gives the player control over the kitten Milo, as he attempts to navigate through a side scrolling world of trees, hostile animals, and other obstacles. Milo plods along at a very slow pace, and can jump from tree branch to tree branch, popping fruit out from the leaves, which he must collect before they turn rotten and disappear. Every moving object from mice to beetles, is lethal to Milo and must be avoided. Fruit can be dropped on enemies for extra points. Eggs can be collected to use as weapons which must be dropped on enemies. Bottles of milk grant temporary invincibility. And if the player manages to collect four eggs that spell out the word HELP, Otis will appear to attack enemies that are headed Milo's way. However, touching Otis will also kill Milo..

La historia de dos animales y sus aventuras. Chatran, el gato, y Pocky, el perro, son dos animales que crecieron juntos en la misma granja. Un día, los dos se separan y comienzan un viaje para encontrarse. La aventura aventurera ya menudo peligrosa encuentra a los dos animales que viajan a través de montañas, llanuras y tierras cubiertas de nieve, buscándose unos a otros.

Koneko Monogatari : Les aventures de Chatran est basé sur le film de Koneko Monogatari .Le joueur contrôle le chaton Chatran, alors qu'il tente de progresser dans un monde d' arbres, d' animaux hostiles autres obstacles.

locale.title: Koneko Monogatari : The Adventures of Chatran

game.name: Link No Bouken - The Legend Of Zelda 2

locale.title: Link No Bouken - The Legend Of Zelda 2
locale.synopsis:
Link no Bouken - The Legend of Zelda 2 is the second installment in The Legend of Zelda series, published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Entertainment System. It was originally released in Japan on the Famicom Disk System less than a year after the release of The Legend of Zelda.
The Adventure of Link is a direct sequel to the original The Legend of Zelda, and again involves the protagonist Link on a quest to save Princess Zelda -- who is not the same Princess from the first game, but another member of the royal family by the same name, who was placed under a sleeping spell a long time ago. The Adventure of Link's emphasis on side-scrolling and RPG-style elements, however, was a significant departure from its predecessor and has given it a reputation as the "black sheep" of the Zelda series. It is arguably the hardest Zelda game. Despite this reputation, the game was highly successful and introduced many elements that would become commonplace in future Zelda games.

Hay seis palacios escondidos en Hyrule. Link debe ganar experiencia luchando contra los subordinados de Ganon, y obtener información mientras visita ciudades aquí y allá. Y, después de derrotar a los guardianes en los palacios del Valle de la Muerte, debe obtener la Trifuerza del coraje: esa es la misión de Link.

Link no Bouken - The Legend of Zelda 2 nous fait retrouver les bottes du héros d'Hyrule, le grand Link. Partez à la recherche de la Triforce pour réveiller la princesse Zelda, plongée dans un sommeil profond, tandis que les sbires de Ganon tentent de ressusciter leur maître. Le titre propose une carte du monde, une vue de côté permettant un défilement horizontal et introduit des éléments qui deviendront cultes dans la suite de la série.

locale.title: Link no Bouken : The Legend of Zelda 2

locale.synopsis: Un juego de rompecabezas pornográfico.
Jeu de puzzle pour adulte ou vous devez reconstituer l'image d'une jolie jeune femme.
Un juego de rompecabezas pornográfico.
Jeu de puzzle pour adulte ou vous devez reconstituer l'image d'une jolie jeune femme.
Un juego de rompecabezas pornográfico.
Jeu de puzzle pour adulte ou vous devez reconstituer l'image d'une jolie jeune femme.
Un juego de rompecabezas pornográfico.
Jeu de puzzle pour adulte ou vous devez reconstituer l'image d'une jolie jeune femme.
Un juego de rompecabezas pornográfico.
Jeu de puzzle pour adulte ou vous devez reconstituer l'image d'une jolie jeune femme.

locale.title: Lutter
locale.synopsis: A side scrolling adventure game where you must rescue a maiden from the dungeon of an evil force. You'll navigate the dungeon and can fight and take damage from monsters by bumping into them. You will also come across keys to use for doors.
Nuestro gran héroe Lutter debe navegar para encontrar a seis damiselas desaparecidas y atravesar la tierra implacable para derrotar a los enormes monstruos que los mantienen como rehenes.
Un jeu d'aventure où vous devez sauver une jeune fille d un donjon d'une force maléfique. Vous allez naviguer dans le donjon et combattre des monstres. Vous trouverez également des clés à utiliser.

locale.title: Maerchen Veil
locale.synopsis: A long time ago, people from Ferikusu could communicate with the gods and divine spirits. The king of the kingdom is now looking for a young man to marry his daughter, the royal princess. Many contestants are selected and a tournament is organized to decide of the new prince. However, before the end or the ceremony, an evil magician sends the last hero, the one the princess has fallen in love with, to an unknown and desolated world. He also quickly realizes that he fell under a terrible curse, and he has been turned into a weird creature. The only item he has left is a magic bracelet the princess gave him. The player takes control of the lost prince and his journey will take him back to where he came from, confront the evil magician and marry the princess he loves. Each stage starts with a short animation (called a "visual stage") which unfolds the story as the game progresses. The rest of the game follows a classic top-view action formula, where the hero defeats all kind of enemies with the help of his magic powers. Sometimes, special items can be found under tree logs or rocks.

El rey del País de los Bosques en Félix envió una proclamación por todo Félix anunciando que estaba buscando a un joven adecuado para llevar a su amada hija como esposa. Muchos pretendientes respondieron y posteriormente el rey los sometió a una gran variedad de juicios. Al final, la decisión se redujo a dos pretendientes. Uno era el príncipe del País de los Lagos en Félix, y el otro era un mago que había usado sus poderes para transformarse en un apuesto joven.
El corazón de la princesa se posó sobre el príncipe del País de los Lagos, y los dos proclamaron su amor mutuo con un juramento. Sin embargo, después de enterarse de esto, el mago se transformó en la forma del príncipe para llevarse a la princesa. Lanzó una maldición sobre el príncipe y lo transportó lejos de Félix, al otro extremo del mundo.

Il y a longtemps, les gens de Ferikusu pouvaient communiquer avec les dieux et les esprits divins. Le roi est maintenant à la recherche d'un jeune homme pour épouser sa fille. Plusieurs candidats sont sélectionnés et un tournoi est organisé pour décider du nouveau prince. Cependant, avant la fin de la cérémonie, un magicien envoie le dernier héros, celui dont la princesse est tombé amoureuse, dans un monde inconnu et désolé. Il se rend rapidement compte qu'il est tombé sous une terrible malédiction, et qu'il a été transformé en une créature bizarre. Le seul élément qu'il mui reste est un bracelet magique, que la princesse lui a donné. Le joueur prend le contrôle du prince perdu pour affronter le méchant magicien et épouser la princesse qu'il aime.

locale.title: Magma Project - Hacker
locale.synopsis: Magma Project Hacker is a sci-fi themed RPG and an adaptation of the 1985 PC/Amiga/Atari ST strategy game Hacker. As with the Famicom Disk System adaptation of Monty on the Run, a considerable number of liberties were taken with the game's themes practically transforming it into a completely different game. Ironically, the story more closely resembles another western PC game, Captive, with its plot.nnThe player character witnesses a murder and is told to seek information on a shadowy organization known as the Magma Project by the dying victim. In order to effectively hunt for clues, the player character uses a device to activate a robot on the other side of the planet and employs the robot's various combat and exploration functions to track down the Magma Project.

Eres testigo de un asesinato y se le dice que busque información sobre una oscura organización conocida como Proyecto Magma por la víctima moribunda. Para buscar pistas con eficacia, debes usar un dispositivo para activar un robot en el otro lado del planeta y emplear las diversas funciones de combate y exploración del robot para rastrear el Proyecto Magma.

Le joueur est témoin d'un meurtre et on lui demande de chercher des informations sur une sombre organisation appelée Projet Magma. Afin de trouver efficacement les indices, le personnage utilise un dispositif pour activer un robot de l'autre côté de la planète et emploie les diverses fonctions de combat et d'exploration du robot pour poursuivre le projet Magma.

locale.title: Mahjong
locale.synopsis: Mahjong is a classic Chinese game available in many different variations.Being a Japanese game, Mahjong for the Nintendo Famicom unsurprisinglyrevolves around the Japanese version of the game, also known as "Reach Mahjong".While originally a game for 4 players, Nintendo for some reason turned it into a two-player game when they released it for their console. This obviously has it's effect on the rules.

Puede disfrutar de la emoción y la emoción de jugar Mahjong contra la computadora.
Hay 3 niveles: Principiante, Intermedio y Experto, que se seleccionan según la habilidad del jugador. ¡Es genial para practicar! Especailly, en el nivel de habilidad superior, hay límites de tiempo (aproximadamente 12 segundos) que te permiten disfrutar de jugadas rápidas. Además, automáticamente calcula y muestra la puntuación en la pantalla.

Le Mahjong est un jeu chinois disponible dans de nombreuses versions différentes.A l'origine, un jeu pour 4 joueurs, Nintendo l'a transformé en un jeu à deux joueurs quand ils l'ont publié. Cela a évidemment son effet sur les règles.

locale.title: Mahjong Goraku - Bishoujo Meijinsen
locale.synopsis: Win rounds of mahjong against female opponents. After winning enough they will show cut scenes of themselves undressing.
Gana juegos de mahjong contra oponentes femeninas. Después de ganar, se mostrarán desvistiéndose.
Gagnez des parties de mahjong contre des adversaires féminines. Après avoir gagné elles se montreront en train de se déshabiller.

locale.title: Mahjong Kazoku
locale.synopsis: Mahjong Kazoku ("Mahjong Family") is a standard Mahjong simulation game for Nintendo's Famicom Disk System. It is a one-on-one version of the game, rather than the standard four-player board game arrangement, and it incorporates many of the various and byzantine scoring rules of the game.nnIrem developed and published the game but left a mysterious licensing credit to Ox Inc. on the title screen. It's possible the game is a port of an obscure Japanese Mahjong computer game, or at least borrows some of its coding for the AI opponent or scoring systems.

Mahjong Kazoku ("Mahjong Family") es un juego de simulación Mahjong estándar para el sistema de disco Famicom de Nintendo. Es una versión individual del juego, en lugar del arreglo de juego de mesa estándar para cuatro jugadores, e incorpora muchas de las diversas reglas de puntuación bizantinas del juego.nnnnIrem desarrolló y publicó el juego, pero dejó un misterioso crédito de licencia para Ox Inc. en la pantalla de título. Es posible que el juego sea un puerto de un oscuro juego de computadora Mahjong japonés, o al menos tome prestada parte de su codificación para el oponente de IA o los sistemas de puntuación.
Mahjong Kazoku ('Mahjong Family') est un jeu de Mahjong. Il s'agit d'une version à part du jeu qui intègre plusieurs règles de notation différentes. nn

game.name: Matou No Houkai - The Hero Of Babel

locale.title: Matou No Houkai - The Hero Of Babel
locale.synopsis: During the height of Babylonian civilization, people built the Tower of Babel in an attempt to reach god. God sees this, and becomes angry with mankind's hubris. He rains thunder down upon the tower to drive people away. In order to keep people away from the tower, god fills it up with giant creatures and evil spiritsnnSeveral thousands of years later, the strongest devil Asmodeous gains control over all of the creatures and spirits that god placed in the tower. He attacks the neighboring towns, and steals all of their golden and silver treasures, as well as the most beautiful maiden in the land.nnYour mission of salvation is to rescue the maiden, and destroy the cursed tower in order to return peace to the world.

Durante el apogeo de la civilización babilónica, la gente construyó la Torre de Babel en un intento de alcanzar a Dios. Dios ve esto y se enoja con la arrogancia de la humanidad. Él llueve trueno sobre la torre para alejar a la gente. Para mantener a las personas alejadas de la torre, Dios lo llena de criaturas gigantes y espíritus malignos.nnnnVarios miles de años después, el diablo más fuerte Asmodeous gana el control de todas las criaturas y espíritus que Dios colocó en la torre. Ataca las ciudades vecinas y roba todos sus tesoros de oro y plata, así como a la doncella más bella de la tierra.nnnnTu misión de salvación es rescatar a la doncella y destruir la torre maldita para devolverle la paz al mundo.

Pendant le règne de la civilisation babylonienne, les gens ont construit la Tour de Babel pour tenter d'atteindre Dieu. Dieu voit cela, et se met en colère contre l'orgueil de l'humanité. Afin de garder les gens loin de la tour, Dieu la remplit avec des créatures géantes et des esprits mauvais. nnPlusieurs milliers d'années plus tard, le démon le plus fort Asmodeous prends le contrôle sur toutes les créatures et les esprits que Dieu a placé dans la tour. Il attaque les villes voisines.nnVotre mission est de sauver la jeune fille, et de détruire la tour maudite afin de faire revenir la paix.

locale.title: Matou no Houkai : The Hero of Babel
Meikyuu Jiin Dababa
locale.synopsis:
The game takes place in India, where a young man's significant-other is kidnapped by an evil wizard. He must then tackle the four areas of the labyrinth temple of Dababa to rescue her.
In order to accomplish this task, the player cannot simple move across the floor. Rather, the player and all of the enemies hop from one square tile to another, throughout the game. In a majority of stages, the player must uncover the seals which will unlock the door to the next stage by leaping on to the particular tiles which keep the seals concealed. Not every door will take the player forward, however, as some doors are trick doors that may take the player to a previous stage. In some stages, the player must simply survive the onslaught of enemies, while in others, the player is racing against the clock.

El otro yo de un joven es secuestrado por un mago malvado. Luego debe abordar las cuatro áreas del templo laberinto de Dababa para rescatarla.nnnnPara lograr esta tarea, el jugador no puede moverse por el piso. Por el contrario, el jugador y todos los enemigos saltan de una casilla a otra a lo largo del juego.

La petite amie d'un jeune homme est kidnappée par un sorcier maléfique.
